sentence: The image is a screenshot of a blog webpage titled "indigo line BLOG" with a focus on graphic design, technology, and creativity.
sentence_cn: 图片是名为“靛蓝线BLOG”的博客网页截图，该博客专注于平面设计、技术和创意。

sentence: The header includes the blog's name and a navigation menu with links such as "Home," "News," "Design," and "Tips & Tricks."
sentence_cn: 标题包括博客的名称和导航菜单，其中有“主页”、“新闻”、“设计”和“提示和技巧”等链接。

sentence: Below the header is a post titled "How to Choose and Pay for Graphic Design School," attributed to "Dave," dated July 10th, 2012.
sentence_cn: 标题下方是一篇题为“如何选择和支付平面设计学校费用”的帖子，作者是“戴夫”，发布日期为 2012 年 7 月 10 日。
words: How to Choose and Pay for Graphic Design School,

sentence: It includes an introductory paragraph about choosing a college for graphic design with a "Read more" link and social media sharing options.
sentence_cn: 它包括一个关于选择平面设计学院的介绍性段落，其中带有“阅读更多”链接和社交媒体共享选项。

sentence: There's a small image of people sitting on grass in front of a building.
sentence_cn: 有一小幅图像，显示人们坐在建筑物前的草地上。

sentence: Further down is a section titled "6 Website Design Tips," also by Dave, from June 13th, 2012.
sentence_cn: 下面还有一节题为“6 个网站设计技巧”的部分，也是由 Dave 于 2012 年 6 月 13 日撰写的。

sentence: It includes text about improving website performance and a "Read more" link.
sentence_cn: 它包括有关提高网站性能的文本和“阅读更多”链接。

sentence: An image of a newspaper headline "GOOD NEWS!!" with a coffee cup accompanies the text.
sentence_cn: 报纸标题“好消息！！”的图片与文字一起出现，旁边还有一只咖啡杯。

sentence: The right sidebar includes a "Subscribe" section with icons for Facebook, Twitter, and RSS, alongside lists of "Recent Posts" and "Popular Posts."
sentence_cn: 右侧边栏包含一个“订阅”部分，其中有 Facebook、Twitter 和 RSS 的图标，以及“最近的帖子”和“热门帖子”的列表。

sentence: Topics mentioned range from graphic design school tips to discussions about YouTube and web traffic.
sentence_cn: 提到的话题包括平面设计学校技巧以及有关 YouTube 和网络流量的讨论。

sentence: At the bottom, there's an "About Me" section with a placeholder for an image, indicating space for a personal introduction.
sentence_cn: 在底部，有一个“关于我”部分，其中有一个图像的占位符，表示个人介绍的空间。

sentence: The page background features a yellow, abstract, grunge-style design.
sentence_cn: 页面背景采用黄色、抽象、垃圾摇滚风格的设计。
